item.title: MoneyWeek news quiz: What will FSCS limit be raised to?
item.description: The Autumn Budget, energy price cap, inflation, and Nvidia all made headlines this week. How closely were you following the news?

item.title: Energy bills to rise by 0.2% in January 2026
item.description: Costs are rising to cover funding of the Sizewell C nuclear project in Suffolk

item.title: Should ISA investors be forced to hold UK shares?
item.description: The UK government would like ISA investors to hold more UK stocks – but many of us are already overexposed

item.title: How Germany became the new sick man of Europe
item.description: Friedrich Merz, Germany's Keir Starmer, seems unable to tackle the deep-seated economic problems the country is facing. What happens next?
